name: The Unsurprising Jack
description:
This is a game for the Yogscast Game Jam 2020,

You are a Jack in the box that is terrible at surprising people and you need to go on an adventure too learn how to surprise people

The controls are WASD,  Arrow Keys, Jump on enemies heads to hurt them

Sorry for some of the bugs, Get hurt when jump on enemies sometimes, Boss doesn't show health decrease, Settings is useless, Mute doesn't work

Hope you enjoy the game!!!
